signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a cost-saving alternative to their current solution, Help Scout.
signals.customer_ask: I want to make sure that I'm making the right decision.
signals.context: Team of three using shared emails in Google Workspace

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about losing functionality when switching from Help Scout to Hiver.
signals.customer_ask: I want to make sure I'm not going to lose any functions.
signals.context: Team of three using shared emails in Google Workspace

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the limitations of the free account and its suitability for setting up their needs.
signals.customer_ask: Is that enough for me to like work in there and set it up?
signals.context: Team of three using shared emails in Google Workspace

signals.problem_statement: The customer is frustrated with the product's user licensing model, which requires purchasing in buckets.
signals.customer_ask: Why can't I just buy three?
signals.context: Team of three using shared emails in Google Workspace

signals.problem_statement: The customer is confused about the billing information provided on the website regarding user limits.
signals.customer_ask: Where do you see that it's sold in buckets?
signals.context: Team of three using shared emails in Google Workspace
